page.title: 03TRAFFIC SURVEY.LANGTOFT
page.content: There are two roads going through Langtoft and they are called the village street and the A15 Trunk road. We decided to do a survey on these roads to see the amount of traffic that goes through.We did our survey on the main road and we saw a lot of traffic.Each survey took one hour. These are the results for the morning. Buses 1,Motor bikes 4,Cars 148,lorries 27,Vans 32,Bike 5,Tractors 2,and Coaches 2. These are the results for the afternoon. Buses 2,Motor bikes 2,Cars 158,Lorries 24, Vans 21, Bikes 4, Tractors 0, Emergences 0, and Coaches 1, We also did a survey on the village street and the results showed that the amount of traffic was much less except for gravel lorries from the pits. By Kirri Edwards Simon Tee
